title: How is this okay?
body: The way that some people to react to a bad game is often over the top, but this is just ridiculous. What do you think about this behavior?

replies.body: Why make it worse? You do realise the only power Toxic people have is Chat... Take that power away by muting them and bravo they can't do anything.
Makes me want to quit the game :,(

Is this "name and shame"?
I thought that was against the rules.
A post about poor behaviour that is itself poor behaviour.
Pot.Kettle.Black.

> [{quoted}](name=QAPLA,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=uhEmTE4p,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-06-07T23:42:12.883+0000)
> Is this "name and shame"?

If it were a name and shame, i'd like a category just for that. Seriously.

I believe a lot of people would agree with me on that one
